job.title: Software Engineers (Java, C++ or JavaScript) - All Levels with Security Clearance
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: we are looking for multiple software engineers at all levels to assist in developing a next generation cuttingedge extensible framework for mission management command ampamp telemetry and flight dynamics our clients complex domain requires innovative solutions to meet evolving customer needs on this program you will work with teams of engineers to develop and improve advanced algorithms that handle large data sets with complex constraints you will gain experience with the full software lifecycle including design development test delivery and maintenance in addition to working with other software disciplines our developers are exposed to various technologies including multitiered architectures amazon web services and geospatial visualization tools our program follows modern agiledevops development practices and utilizing an agile framework experience in this area is a plus we provide robust and easytouse tools for reporting status and estimates to your agile team leadership meaning more time for true problem solving our small agile teams adapt to evolving problem sets and engineers benefit from a flexible work environment where engineers can migrate between teams to contribute to new domains required skillsltbrgtltulgtltligtactive tssci security clearanceltligtltligt years of javac programming experienceltligtltligt years of sw development experience using objectoriented techniquesltbrgtltligtltulgt
